### Request an app

Don't see a web app you need? We're constantly adding new ones to Zapier based
on customer requests.

Email us the apps you'd like added today!

### Add an app

Add an app to Zapier yourself! Our developer platform lets you create triggers
and actions people can use to automate and integrate your app with hundreds of
others.

Go to the developer platform

### Get updates

Stay up-to-date with new apps and features as they become available on Zapier.

Go to the Updates Blog

Blog Post

## How to create a custom AI chatbot with Zapier Interfaces

  * 

Read More

# Top AI Tools Apps

## 1 - 22 of 145 AI Tools apps by most popular

  * ### ChatGPT

### ChatGPT

ChatGPT is an AI tool built by OpenAI that enables conversational automation.
A more powerful OpenAI integration is available here:
https://zapier.com/apps/openai/integrations

  * ### OpenAI (GPT-3, DALL-E, Whisper)

### OpenAI (GPT-3, DALL-E, Whisper)

From the makers of ChatGPT, the OpenAI integration for GPT-3, DALL·E, or
Whisper. Build AI powered workflows with OpenAI’s powerful models. An
optimized ChatGPT integration is available here:
https://zapier.com/apps/chatgpt/integrations

  * ### Mem

### Mem

Mem is a tool to capture, share, and access information from anywhere.

  * ### Browse AI

### Browse AI

Browse AI is a web automation tool that lets you extract and monitor data from
any website with no code.

  * ### Seamless AI

### Seamless AI

Seamless AI is a real-time B2B Sales search engine to find leads using the
power of AI.

  * ### ChatBot

### ChatBot

ChatBot is a universal and comprehensive framework for building modern AI
chatbots. It can be used by total beginners as well as advanced developers.

  * ### Read AI

### Read AI

Read AI makes meetings more effective and efficient with AI generated
summaries, highlights, transcripts, and video playback for Zoom, Google Meet,
and Teams.

  * ### Grain

### Grain

Grain joins your calls to take notes, document the next steps, and file
automated meeting notes in platforms like Slack, HubSpot, and more.

  * ### Fathom

### Fathom

beta

Fathom combines an AI meeting assistant that improves the productivity of your
team with a conversational intelligence platform.

  * ### Chatbase

### Chatbase

With Chatbase, you can create a custom GPT chatbot that knows your data.
Upload a pdf or a link and get a chatbot that has the info on it.

Featured

Google MakerSuite

Google MakerSuite is a fast, easy way to start prototyping generative AI ideas
using Google's PaLM model.

##

  * ### Descript

### Descript

Descript is a tool for getting accurate, fast, and affordable automatic
transcriptions of your audio and video media. Once your media is transcribed,
you can also edit the text - media word processing.

  * ### HeyGen

### HeyGen

Meet HeyGen - The best AI video generation platform for your team.

  * ### Copy.ai

### Copy.ai

100x productivity without sacrificing an ounce of quality in your brand’s
voice, style, and authority.

  * ### Supernormal

### Supernormal

Supernormal delivers detailed meeting notes automatically, saving you time and
effort spent writing, polishing, and sharing notes.

  * ### CustomGPT

### CustomGPT

CustomGPT builds your own AI-powered chatbot with your business content. Easy,
no-code platform used by total beginners as well as advanced developers.

  * ### Synthesia

### Synthesia

Video drives action. Now you can automatically enrich all your transactional
emails with personalized videos from Synthesia.

  * ### Feathery

### Feathery

Feathery is a powerful form builder for product teams.

  * ### Personal AI

### Personal AI

Personal AI, your digital mind for enhanced living. Unlock AI's power as it
recalls memories and engages in meaningful conversations.

  * ### Growbots

### Growbots

Growbots is an all-in-one AI tool for automated outbound sales, combining
scalable prospecting and targeted email outreach.

  * ### Cody

### Cody

Cody is an intelligent AI assistant like ChatGPT – with the added benefit of
being able to train it on your business, processes with your own knowledge
base.

  * ### Zapier Chatbots

beta

### Zapier Chatbots

beta

Create custom AI chatbots and take action with built-in automation

  * ### Anthropic (Claude)

### Anthropic (Claude)

Claude by Anthropic is an AI assistant trained for safety and conversational
understanding.
